column5: good read lots of neat facts I wouldn't have ever expected in there
Go of read... And very true...
I've always enjoyed Justin's writing.  His posts and pic here were some of the best ever!

Good article, as someone that fished regularly in tournaments here he is right about following the trail. Some lakes just regularly produce a better chance at a good sized bass than others. We have those lakes here too, plenty of bass, but ones over 3 - 3 1/2 pounds are a rarity, on other lakes a 5 pounder might not be a lock for big fish on tournament day.
